summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for the period from September 1, 2014, to September 30, 2014. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting a significant transfer of $250,000. The document is marked confidential and includes instructions for reporting errors.

persons.name: Amamb Kirby Bane
persons.context: Amamb Kirby Bane is identified as the account holder for the Elite Money Market Deposit account detailed in the financial statement.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $250,000 was made from the account.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $8,446.24 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account balance as of September 1, 2014, was $568,666,527.57.
The ending balance as of September 30, 2014, was $68,424,973.81.
A significant transfer of $250,000 occurred on September 12, 2014.
An interest payment of $8,446.24 was credited to the account on September 30, 2014.
The document contains instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
